title: Bug 116786 - Library include does not store relative path
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. Currently, the absolute path is being saved.
OB: Currently, when a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer saves the absolute path instead of the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a report design.
3. Include a library in the report design.
4. Save the report design.
5. Verify that the relative path is saved for the included library.
